column6: This spacious and clean house is an excellent place for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers alike. Located in a private, residential neighborhood only 10 minutes from The Domain and the high-tech corridor of northwest Austin.\n\nThis listing is one of two delightful rooms available in the house (see Private East Room in Spacious North Austin Home). One or both rooms may be booked, depending on availability.
column9: Private Blue Room in Spacious North Austin Home
